title: FAQ
subtitle: Things I get asked a lot

questions.title: Are you a student?
questions.answer: Yes, currently I am a first year Computer Science student at the Eindhoven University of Technology.

questions.title: What technologies do you use?
questions.answer: I mainly use Nuxt.js to make websites and Express with typescript for backend applications.

questions.title: What kind of photography do you do?
questions.answer: I mainly do cityscape and landscape photography. But I also shoot subjects from time to time.

questions.title: What equipment do you use?
questions.answer: I use a Canon 750d with a 50mm f1.8

questions.title: What software do you use?
questions.answer: I use Adobe Lightroom or Capture One for editing.
